statements: SELECT * FROM user_permissions;
SELECT user_id, permission_level FROM user_permissions WHERE permission_level = 'admin';
SELECT user_id, trading_system FROM user_permissions WHERE trading_system = 'Forex';
SELECT user_id, access_controls, arb_trading_operations FROM user_permissions WHERE arb_trading_operations = TRUE;
SELECT user_id, permission_level, access_controls FROM user_permissions ORDER BY permission_level DESC, user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_permissions WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, permission_level FROM user_permissions WHERE permission_level = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM user_permissions WHERE trading_system = 'algo_trading' AND permission_level = 'user';
SELECT DISTINCT trading_system FROM user_permissions WHERE arb_trading_operations = TRUE;
SELECT user_id, access_controls, permission_level FROM user_permissions ORDER BY user_id DESC, trading_system ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_permissions;
SELECT user_id, permission_level FROM user_permissions WHERE permission_level > 5;
SELECT system_name FROM trading_systems WHERE access_level = 2;
SELECT user_id, permission_level FROM user_permissions ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT system_name, access_level FROM trading_systems ORDER BY access_level ASC;
SELECT user_id, permission_level FROM user_permissions WHERE user_id = '12345678-1234-5678-1234-567812345678';
SELECT system_id, system_name FROM trading_systems WHERE access_level > 5 ORDER BY system_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, permission_level FROM user_permissions WHERE permission_level = 2 AND user_id IN ('87654321-4321-8765-4321-876543218765', '98765432-5432-8765-5432-876543218765');
SELECT system_id, system_name, access_level FROM trading_systems WHERE access_level >= 3 ORDER BY system_name ASC, access_level DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(user_id) AS total_permissions FROM user_permissions GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_permissions > 1;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_name, permissions FROM users ORDER BY user_name DESC;
SELECT users.user_name, roles.role_name FROM users JOIN role_users ON users.user_id = role_users.user_id JOIN roles ON role_users.role_id = roles.role_id;
SELECT user_id, user_name, permissions FROM users WHERE permissions LIKE '%read%';
SELECT role_name FROM roles ORDER BY role_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_name, permissions FROM users WHERE user_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT user_id, user_name, role_name FROM users JOIN role_users ON users.user_id = role_users.user_id JOIN roles ON roles.role_id = role_users.role_id;
SELECT user_id, user_name, role_name FROM users JOIN role_users ON users.user_id = role_users.user_id JOIN roles ON roles.role_id = role_users.role_id ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, user_name, role_name FROM users JOIN role_users ON users.user_id = role_users.user_id JOIN roles ON roles.role_id = role_users.role_id WHERE role_name = 'Admin';
SELECT * FROM Users;
SELECT username, role FROM Users;
SELECT user_id, role FROM Users ORDER BY role DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM Users WHERE role = 'Admin';
SELECT * FROM Users INNER JOIN UserPermissions ON Users.user_id = UserPermissions.user_id;
SELECT * FROM Users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, role FROM Users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT Users.username, Roles.role_name FROM Users JOIN Roles ON Users.role = Roles.role_name;

SELECT Users.username, Permissions.permission_name FROM Users JOIN UserPermissions ON Users.user_id = UserPermissions.user_id JOIN Permissions ON UserPermissions.permission_id = Permissions.permission_id;
SELECT Users.username, COUNT(*) AS num_permissions FROM Users JOIN UserPermissions ON Users.user_id = UserPermissions.user_id GROUP BY Users.username;
SELECT username, role FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM roles ORDER BY role_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, role FROM users WHERE role = 'Admin';
SELECT user_id, role FROM user_roles INNER JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id;
SELECT permission_name, permission_type FROM permissions WHERE permission_type = 'READ' ORDER BY permission_name ASC;
SELECT user_id, username, role FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT username, role FROM users WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM roles WHERE role_name = 'admin';
SELECT user_id, role_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id WHERE role_name = 'admin';

SELECT users.username, permissions.permission_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id JOIN role_permissions ON roles.role_id = role_permissions.role_id JOIN permissions ON role_permissions.permission_id = permissions.permission_id WHERE users.role = 'admin';
